data.name: ResourceFlowDirection
data.comment: Controls the FlowDirection for all elements in the RootFrame. Set to the traditional direction of this resource file's language

data.name: ResourceLanguage
data.comment: Controls the Language and ensures that the font for all elements in the RootFrame aligns with the app's language. Set to the language code of this resource file's language.

data.name: CycleDurationSettingExplanation
data.value: Cycles can range anywhere from 21 to 35 days in adults and from 21 to 45 days in young teens.

data.name: LastPeriodStartedSetting
data.value: When did your last cycle start?

data.name: PeriodForecastExplanationStandard
data.value: Based on your initial settings. Preffered option when on contraceptive pill.

data.name: PillAlarmExplanation
data.value: You will receive a notification to take your contraceptive pill.

data.name: PeriodForecastExplanationAdvanced
data.value: Based on a 12 months average. Improves prediction based on input.

data.name: FertilityForecastExplanationAdvanced
data.value: Based on a 12 months average. Improves prediction based on input.

data.name: FertilityForecastExplanationStandard
data.value: Based on your initial settings. Preffered option when on contraceptive pill.

data.name: DelayPeriodMessage
data.value: This means your period is late.

data.name: DelayPeriodQuestion
data.value: Do you want to delay tracking?

data.name: PeriodEarlierMessage
data.value: You know, it's earlier with {0} days.

data.name: PeriodLaterMessage
data.value: You know, it's later with {0} days.

data.name: EndDateBeforeStartValidation
data.value: The end of cycle you selected is before the confirmed start of cycle. Please pick another date.

data.name: EndDateFarInFutureValidation
data.value: This means your cycle lasted more than twice the average. Is this correct?

data.name: EndDateTooCloseToStartValidation
data.value: This means your cycle lasted less than 2 days. Is this correct?

data.name: OverlapExistingPeriodValidation
data.value: This start date is overlapping another existing cycle period. Do you want to modify existing period?

data.name: StartDateInFutureValidation
data.value: The date you selected is in the future. Please select another date.

data.name: SetupStartDateInFutureValidation
data.value: The date you selected is in the future. Is this correct?

data.name: PinValidationMissing
data.value: The {0} cannot be empty. You must enter the pin.

data.name: PinValidationNewPinNotMatch
data.value: New pin and Confirm pin does not match.

data.name: PinValidationOldPinNotMatch
data.value: Old pin you introduced doesn't match your existing pin.
